Drawable - Interface in gui.component
A Component that can be drawn on a Window.
drawCircle(double, double, double) - Method in class gui.Window
Draws the outline of a circle with the center at (x, y) and the given radius.
drawImage(String, double, double) - Method in class gui.Window
Draws the image found at the given path with the upper-left corner at position (x, y).
drawImage(String, double, double, double) - Method in class gui.Window
Draws the image found at the given path with the upper-left corner at position (x, y) and scales it by the given scale.
drawImageCentered(String, double, double) - Method in class gui.Window
Draws the image found at the given path with the center at position (x, y).
drawImageCentered(String, double, double, double) - Method in class gui.Window
Draws the image found at the given path with the center at position (x, y) and scales it by the given scale.
drawImageCentered(String, double, double, double, double) - Method in class gui.Window
Draws the image found at the given path with the center at position (x, y), scales it by the given scale and rotates it by the given angle, in radians (0–2×π).
drawLine(double, double, double, double) - Method in class gui.Window
Draws a line from (x1, y1) to (x2, y2).
drawOval(double, double, double, double) - Method in class gui.Window
Draws the outline of an oval with a rectangular bounding box that has the upper-left corner at (x, y) and the given width and height.
drawRect(double, double, double, double) - Method in class gui.Window
Draws the outline of a rectangle with the upper-left corner at (x, y) and the given width and height.
drawString(String, double, double) - Method in class gui.Window
Draw the given string with the current color.
drawStringCentered(String, double, double) - Method in class gui.Window

gui - package gui
Contains the main class, Window, and a simple Color class.
gui.component - package gui.component
Extends the Window interface with "Components", which are objects that draw themselves on the window and can react to local user inputs using simple callbacks.

S

setBold(boolean) - Method in class gui.Window
If bold is true, subsequent drawString(String, double, double) operations will use a bold font.

Sets the color for the subsequent drawing operations.

Sets the color for the subsequent drawing operations, using a Color object.

Sets the font size for subsequent drawString(String, double, double) operations, in points.
setResizable(boolean) - Method in class gui.Window
If resizable is true, this window can be resized by the user.
setRoundStroke(boolean) - Method in class gui.Window
If roundStroke is true, subsequent draw...() operations will use round stroke caps and joins instead of flat caps and miter joins.
setStrokeWidth(double) - Method in class gui.Window
Sets the stroke width for subsequent draw...() operations, in pixels.

W

This method returns only once the window is closed by the user (or if it was not open in the first place).

A class for creating simple GUIs (graphical user interfaces).
